thread.title: Ilker Tasci and Duygu Ersoy
thread.title_full: Energia reviewed by Ilker Tasci and Duygu Ersoy

author: Ilker Tasci and Duygu Ersoy
title: Ilker Tasci and Duygu Ersoy
text:
It's been 25 days since I paid for the boiler fix. The engineer still couldn't even diagnose the problem. Once they get payment they don't even care how it goes, tells me to see it with the engineer.
They take the payment in advance, without doing NOTHING which means you can pay it and wait for ages to get your service.
